N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 84.15 - Saturdays, sundays and holidays

State Regulations
(a) All Saturdays, Sundays and legal holidays shall, so far as practicable, be allowed as days off. Employees required to work on any of these days shall not be entitled to compensatory time off in lieu thereof. (b) The days prescribed as holidays by the department's annual calendar for the school year shall be observed as holidays. Notes
